post.description: Use this endpoint to create JWT token for various resource requests

delete.description: Member will be disabled and no longer be able to login

put.description: A user can update the information related to the account

post.description: Member Registration - A member record is created in the portal. The account is however not active until user's status is changed to active from the config manager or the user activates using the confirmation link.
Lost Password - A link is sent to email with link to reset password
Lost Username - A mail is sent with username
Reset Password - A user can update password

200.description: Specification associated with the interactive document represented by the id

get.description: Gets a particular application based on uuid in path

put.description: Edits the existing application for a logged in member

requestBody.description: Full entity of an application with changed values of fields that needs to be updated

delete.description: Deletes a particular application from the database based on uuid in path

get.description: Gets all applications of a logged in member

post.description: Creates an application entry for a logged in member

requestBody.description: Full entity of an application that needs to be created

get.description: Gets all applications of a logged in member that can be registered
Gets all registrable applications for a particular applicaion that doesn't have a package key yet

post.summary: Registers a package/plan with a package key for an application
post.description: Creates a package key for selected package/plan combo for an application

requestBody.description: Package and Plan for which package key gets created

post.description: Use this endpoint to refresh ttl of token by 15 min

example.message: Validation failure during Create or Update of entity
